titles.title: Recognizing on Memorial Day, May 29, 2023, the denial of full participation in their Government through statehood by active duty servicemembers, National Guard members, reservists, veterans, and their families who are residents of the District of Columbia.

Recognizing on Memorial Day, May 29, 2023, the denial of full participation in their Government through statehood by active duty servicemembers, National Guard members, reservists, veterans, and their families who are residents of the District of Columbia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Accountability.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes that District of Columbia residents, including past and current servicemembers and their families, have earned and deserve statehood and full participation in the federal government.
